New Records: South Africa have the lowest total defended in a T20 by South Africa
It's also the lowest target Bangladesh have failed to chase in a T20
Key Match Events: Taskin smears a full toss into the off side, and they can only run a single
An impossible task for the new batter!
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa captain Markram ‘nervous and tired’
Bangladesh captain Najmul says his side ‘should have won’
South Africa’s Klaasen is Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: It’s another low-scoring thriller in New York
For as much criticism as the pitch is receiving, it is serving up some cracking matches
